code: import{createAction}from"redux-actions";const MODALSTATE="MODALSTATE";export const ChangeModalState=createAction(MODALSTATE);const initalState={state:{modalState:false}};export default function reducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initalState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case MODALSTATE:{return{state:{modalState:action.payload}};}default:{return state;}}}
